cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 2.6)

# OUTPUT stores the name of the file generated by compilation
# Always use .o extension so .gitignore can ignore it
set (OUTPUT IDJ.o)
project (${OUTPUT})

add_definitions(-std=c++11)

set(SDL2_INCLUDE 
    /usr/local/include
)
set(SDL2_LIB 
    /usr/local/lib/libSDL2.dylib
    /usr/local/lib/libSDL2_image.dylib
    /usr/local/lib/libSDL2_mixer.dylib
    /usr/local/lib/libSDL2_ttf.dylib
)

include_directories (
    include/
    ${SDL2_INCLUDE}
)

add_executable(${OUTPUT}
    src/Main.cpp
    src/Game.cpp
    src/Music.cpp
    src/Sprite.cpp
    src/State.cpp
)

target_link_libraries(${OUTPUT} ${SDL2_LIB})
